componentAttributes.labelThankYou: Thank you for your interest in applying to Climate Corps. Please fill out the information below.
componentAttributes.pillNames: Dashboard | Contact | Education | Background | Preferences | Cover Letter
componentAttributes.pillURLs: home | contactinfo | educationinformation | backgroundinformation | preferences | coverletter

componentAttributes.lblAccessToVehicle: If yes, do you have access to a vehicle this summer or would you be willing to get access to one (e.g. rent)?
componentAttributes.lblAvailabilityAdditionalDetails: List any additional detail about your availability during the fellowship period
componentAttributes.lblAvailabilityNote: Climate Corps Program requires your full-time commitment for the 8-12 weeks long fellowship project. Please indicate your availability between April-September for a full-time commitment to a Climate Corps fellowship project.
componentAttributes.lblInterestForIndiaChina: I'm interested in also applying for
componentAttributes.lblInterestForIndiaChinaHelpText: India program places fellows with organizations in India and is open to Indian nationals. The China program places fellows with organizations in China and is open to Chinese nationals
componentAttributes.lblProjectTypePreferenceNote: Indicate your top three Project Type Preferences from the dropdown lists
componentAttributes.lblRegionalPreferenceChina: Select regions in China you would be willing to relocate to for the fellowship
componentAttributes.lblSectorPreferenceNote: Indicate your top three choices from the dropdown lists
componentAttributes.lblUSDriverLicense: Do you have a valid US Driver's License?
componentAttributes.lblUSRegionPref: Please choose the regions you would be willing to relocate to for the fellowship
componentAttributes.lblUSRegionPrefHelpText: Please note, fellows are expected to pay for and organize any relocation associated with the fellowship. Fellows are also expected to pay for housing and living expenses during the fellowship.
